suppress.notes:
File name: spring-security-*.jar in combination with Spring Framework 5.0.5.RELEASE
Affects Spring Framework 5.0.5.RELEASE only. ^ However it still flags a vulnerability in combination with a newer release (5.1.6.RELEASE) So we'll need to leave it here for now. -AO
This is a false positive, the scanner incorrectly matches a netty CVE against spring-boot-starter-reactor-netty. Our effective (and safe) netty version is 4.1.42.Final
This is a false positive, the scanner incorrectly matches a netty CVE against reactor-netty. Our effective (and safe) netty version is 4.1.42.Final
